EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Stuck in Traffic? Saved by Big Data!_Q214.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered for our upcoming webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We are looking forward to you joining us for our upcoming webinar "Stuck in Traffic? Saved by Big Data!". Please find event details below:
Date: Tuesday, April 29, 2014 Time: 9:00AM PDT (San Francisco)/5:00PM GMT+1 (London) Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?d=669391002&t=a> Event Number: 669 391 002 Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=112132122&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 669 391 002
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
